title: v24.31.0
text:
## What's Changed * add notifications for file upload , prescription by @rash-27 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2070 * Adds support for phone number in HCX Create Patient Profile by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2319 * HCX: Adds "use" in patient profile's telecom by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2321 * Adds a last online filter for users by @skks1212 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2310 * Merge Develop to Staging v24.31.0 by @nihal467 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2322 * Fix Scribe on iOS by @skks1212 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2323 * HCX: Fix payor search filtering and claim supporting info category URL by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2325 * Merge Develop to Staging v24.31.0 | Minor Fix by @nihal467 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2326 * Production release v24.31.0 by @sainak in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2327 **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/compare/v24.30.0...v24.31.0
This discussion was created from the release v24.31.0.

title: v24.31.0
text:
## What's Changed * Added primary color to selected section on consultation page fix #8186 by @NitinPSingh in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8188 * Removed View Discharge Patients button fix #8164 by @NitinPSingh in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8184 * Added a last online filter for users by @skks1212 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8175 * Add popup to acknowledge discharge by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8211 * Enhancements to Camera Feed Component by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8140 * Merge Develop to Staging v24.31.0 by @nihal467 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8210 * Fixes last active filter badge showing up when filters other than the last active filter is applied by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8215 * Merge Develop to Staging v24.31.0 | Minor Fix by @nihal467 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8217 * Production release v24.31.0 by @sainak in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8230 ## New Contributors * @NitinPSingh made their first contribution in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8188 **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/compare/v24.30.1...v24.31.0

title: v24.33.0
text:
## What's Changed * Update stale, to ignore backlog Issues & PRs by @gigincg in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8249 * scroll to mandatory empty fields by @kushalbhana in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8263 * Fix: Added online status to Doctor Connect by @Shelly011s in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8261 * Camera Feed: Ensure camera moves everytime the preset is clicked by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8254 * Live Feed: Move to last accessed preset instead of last created by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8255 * Increased Form Size & Updated Indicator Field by @renoseHarsh in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8244 * Fixed: Misalignment of placeholder text inside date component in the ‚Ä¶ by @thevishvammoliya in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8240 * Fixed: Transfer patient pop-up behavior by @renoseHarsh in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8245 * Show weight and height as unspecified rather than 0 by @shivankacker in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8248 * Cypress: fix incorrect patient category select's id by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8267 * Merge Develop to Staging v24.33.0 by @nihal467 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8269 * Adds support for printing üñ®Ô∏è prescriptions üíä by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8259 * Made Scribe work with Symptoms, Investigations, Diagnosis and Prescriptions by @shivankacker in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8183 * Fix Notifications for Facility Cover Image Deletion by @AnkurPrabhu in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/7609 * Added sorting for events by @khavinshankar in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8270 * Merge Develop to Staging v24.33.0 | Urgent User requirement patch | by @nihal467 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8277 * üõ†Ô∏è Fixes issue with treating physician field being disabled when a search text entered yields no results; üõ†Ô∏è Migrate `UserAutocompleteFormField` to use `useQuery` by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8274 * Fixed date time format for edge cases by @shivankacker in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8280 * Merge Develop to Staging 24.33.0 | Patch for fixing two edge case bugs | by @nihal467 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8282 * Replace deprecated LOC options in Neurological Monitoring table by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8291 * Merge Develop to Staging 24.33.0 | Patch for a bug in neurological monitor by @nihal467 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8292 * Production Release 24.33.0 by @nihal467 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8294 ## New Contributors * @kushalbhana made their first contribution in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8263 * @Shelly011s made their first contribution in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8261 * @renoseHarsh made their first contribution in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8244 * @thevishvammoliya made their first contribution in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8240 **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/compare/v24.32.0...v24.33.0

title: v24.34.0
text:
## What's Changed * Migrate rescript components to typescript; uninstall ReScript by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8316 * Skip commenting on stale issues and avoid auto-closing stale PRs by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8317 * Remove unused dependencies by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8318 * Merge Develop To Staging 24.34.0 by @nihal467 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8319 * Camera Feed: Persist last accessed position or preset by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8320 * Merge Develop to Staging v24.34.0 | Patch to Enhance Camera Feed Experience | by @nihal467 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8322 * Fix Scribe erroring out by @shivankacker in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8331 * Fix Scribe erroring out (#8331) by @shivankacker in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8332 * Fix camera preset save button disable logic for cases of last moved position by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8345 * Merge Develop to Staging 24.34.0 | Patch by @nihal467 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8346 * Use abort controller for submit requests for patient and consultation create by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8354 * Treating physician: Fixes an edge case where clearing query leads to field getting disabled by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8355 * Merge Develop To Staging v24.34.0 | Patch by @nihal467 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8356 * Production release 24.34.0 by @nihal467 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8348 **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/compare/v24.33.0...v24.34.0

title: v24.35.0
text:
## What's Changed * Use staging backend for cypress tests if PR base branch is staging by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8362 * Show "Save and Continue" for Progress Notes and Doctors Log by @shivankacker in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8352 * Fixed rounds type changing for Scribe by @shivankacker in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8350 * Modified the fine text in Patient transfer pop-up to match with recent change by @nihal467 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8344 * Remove unused components and packages by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8339 * Fix Facility Notice functionality by @aSriram199 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8337 * Modified Cypress test to include bed number selection in consultation test by @nihal467 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8383 * Fixed word splitting issue by @JOSHIK27 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8384 * Made General Instructions field in Consultation Form non mandatory by @JOSHIK27 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8368 * Fixes neurological tab from crashing in older browsers by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8392 * Corrected Spelling mistake of daily rounds fields: ventilator_fi02 to ventilator_fio2 in Frontend #8241 by @SagarSharma2809 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8268 * Fixes neurological tab from crashing in older browsers by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8393 * Fix Scroll Issue with Pressure Sores Popup by @gigincg in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8400 * Migrate to Headless UI v2 by @khavinshankar in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8260 * Fixes: Issue #8265 Neurological Tables having incorrect vertical heights... by @thevishvammoliya in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8386 * Hide N/A and null values in event log #8376 by @Nithin9585 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8381 * Update react-pdf; pdfjs worker; Fixes for i18n by @gigincg in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8395 * Enable Facility Cover Image Uploads on Mobile Screens by @gigincg in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8402 * Improve Notes TextArea; Improve i18n by @gigincg in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8396 ## New Contributors * @SagarSharma2809 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8268 * @Nithin9585 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8381 **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/compare/v24.34.0...v24.35.0
This discussion was created from the release v24.35.0.
author: sainak

title: v24.35.0
text:
## What's Changed * fix s3 client error on gcp by @sainak in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2359 * Fix race condition in consultation creation by @sainak in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2299 * Allows creation of duplicate symptoms if cure date is present by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2289 * fix consultation create with bed by @sainak in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2375 * Use new serializer for assets by @sainak in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2380 * Update pre-commit config by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2320 * Updated License by @AryanChoudharyy in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2357 * migrating feature field to array field by @DraKen0009 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2223 * Add option to filter users with no home facility by @shivankacker in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2332 * Rename field `ventilator_fi02` to `ventilator_fio2` by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2356 * Allow ICD11 diagnoses for chapters that were previously disabled by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2350 * Merge migrations by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2385 ## New Contributors * @AryanChoudharyy made their first contribution in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2357 **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/compare/v24.34.0...v24.35.0
This discussion was created from the release v24.35.0.

title: v24.37.0
text:
## What's Changed * Fix pdf previews by @sainak in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8405 * Fix clipping issue login page by @sunny-thakurwar in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/7891 * Fixes facility cover image from not reloading after upload by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8412 * Refactored FileUpload component by @shivankacker in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8329 * Removed unwanted printing of flow rate in preview by @nihal467 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8408 * Cleanup unused files by @sainak in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8326 * Add Abdominal Drain and Change Rules to Ryles on Ouptput DropDown by @aSriram199 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8328 * Make Treating Doctor Field Optional for Domiciliary Care Patients by @JOSHIK27 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8391 * Added patient category descriptions for ICU bed patients by @shivankacker in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/7970 * Add option to filter users by no home facility by @shivankacker in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8247 * fix build workflows after the org rename by @sainak in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8431 * Change CSN references to OHCN by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8433 * remove fireRequestV2 by @sainak in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8446 * Fixes PR template tags by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8453 * Removes Storybook by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8452 * Adds validation for max dosage in PRN prescription #8324 by @Nithin9585 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8378 * Fix allowed extensions not working for file input by @shivankacker in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8419 * Fixed icd11 diagnosis multiselect field making unnecessary requests by @shivankacker in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8448 * Switched to uploadFile from axios in scribe by @shivankacker in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8379 * Enable interaction with other components when a dropdown is open by @khavinshankar in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8432 * Fixes unknown option for heartbeat rhythm; adds i18n to vitals section by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8411 * Improve Treament Summary Report by @khavinshankar in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8295 * Navigate to session expired page instead of showing notification by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8363 * Removes auto fill for uploaded file name by @shivankacker in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8464 * Added translations for home page by @shivankacker in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8461 * Fixed User page Spacing and added translations by @shivankacker in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8462 * Add suggestion chips instead of autofilling diagnosis by @shivankacker in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8369 * Remove proxy and clean up config by @bodhish in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8445 * Adds support for "Still watching" prompt to prevent users from idling when watching stream by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8440 * Modified Fallback URL for cypress in windows system by @nihal467 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8476 * New cypress test to verify doctor's log update functionality by @nihal467 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8479 * Bump cypress version and remove unnecessary imports of "local-cypress" by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8485 * Fixes state admin unable to to switch back to live patients tab from discharged tab by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8490 * Fixed the add location button positioning in desktop view by @nihal467 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8481 * Removes symptoms onset date range filter from patient filters by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8493 **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/compare/v24.35.0...v24.37.0
This discussion was created from the release v24.37.0.
author: sainak

title: v24.37.0
text:
## What's Changed * Upgrade Dependencies by @vigneshhari in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2390 * fix creating notifications if shifting_approving_facility is not available by @sainak in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2372 * Added new skills by @shivankacker in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2302 * Add list and detail serializer with tests for shifting module #1549 by @vigneshhari in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2392 * PDF Generation Alternative - GSoC by @DraKen0009 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2132 * Added actively dying patient category by @shivankacker in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2298 * Replace coronasafe references by @sainak in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2394 * fix docker builds by @sainak in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2393 * remove deprecated fields that has been migrated to new models (Diagnosis, Symptoms and Prescriptions) by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2247 * Fixes check for no treating physician and not mandate for Domicialiary Care by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2382 * Correct I/O Balance output choice spelling mistake for Ryles Tube Aspiration by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2366 * feat: added additional shortcuts to the makefile by @dhruv-goyal-10 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2283 * Show error if doctor is not linked to the consultation facility by @shivankacker in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2309 * Starting translation support by @vigneshhari in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2398 * fix pdf report generation in prod by @sainak in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2400 * add new asset actions and clenup asset_monitor task by @sainak in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2411 * use static jwk instead of auto generating on aws by @sainak in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2413 * allow cors on localhost dev deployment by @sainak in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2415 **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/compare/v24.35.0...v24.37.0
This discussion was created from the release v24.37.0.
author: sainak

title: v24.38.0
text:
## What's Changed * Remove clear all filters when no filters are applied. by @Sulochan-khadka in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8466 * Made AutocompleteFormField open immediately on focus by @JOSHIK27 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8414 * Fixes Autocomplete input erroring when combobox input is cleared by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8501 * Fixes PDF Viewer clipping out in different display zoom settings by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8496 * Procedures: consultation #8366 by @Sulochan-khadka in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8477 * Adds support for üîç Zoom In & Out for üñ®Ô∏è Print Preview component by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8487 * Reorder classnames only on pre-commit by @shivankacker in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8497 * Added: Warning for unsupported browsers by @AdityaJ2305 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8417 * New Cypress Test | Verify the Functionality of Critical Care | by @nihal467 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8517 * Bump @fontsource/inter from 5.0.18 to 5.0.21 by @dependabot in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8508 * Bump @sentry/browser from 8.12.0 to 8.29.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8509 * Bump axios from 1.6.8 to 1.7.7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8454 * Fixed Cypress Flaky test in user advance filter by @nihal467 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8519 * Update documentation README.md : Supported -browsers script by @Zeshanxviii in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8528 * New Crowdin updates by @bodhish in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8538 * Frontend Adjustments for ABDM Plug Conversion by @khavinshankar in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/7817 * Fixed Abha profile linking issue by @khavinshankar in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8550 * Rename all the Cypress filename to follow PascalCase by @nihal467 in contribution in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8528 **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/compare/v24.37.0...v24.38.0

title: September Week 4 Release
text:

investigations in Consultation Form, updated type definitions by @Nithin9585 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8416 * add JWKS_BASE64 for cypress workflow by @sainak in immediately open onFocus by @nihal467 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8598 * Show IV/NIV Badge only for active consultations by @Jacobjeevan in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8603 * fix: sort options i18n by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8602 * New Cypress Test | Patient Switch Bed Functionality | by @nihal467 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8613 * New Cypress Test | Patient Tab Pagination | by @nihal467 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8614 * Reenabled discharge patient admitted to filter by @shivankacker in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/7933 * Fixed bug with sidebar indicator by @shivankacker in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8536 * Reply feature for doctor notes by @UdaySagar-Git in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/7805 * Added facility hubs by @shivankacker in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/7772 * Adding cache control headers by @vishwansh01 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8575 * resolve conflicts by @sainak in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8619 * Adding cache control headers by @sainak in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8622 * Plausible: Track applied filters by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8640 * Fixed fileupload name bug by @shivankacker in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8638 * Fixed Translation in switch bed pop-up by @nihal467 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8648 * Fix: Clearing Facilities Field Causes White Screen #8610 by @AdityaJ2305 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8629 * fix: Show validation error message on facility cover image upload (#8625) by @syedfardeenjeelani in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8639 * Fix camera feed fullscreen bug by @shivankacker in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8650 * Allow archiving consent records by @khavinshankar in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8654 * Fixed translation of Spo2 in criticalcare by @nihal467 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8656 * Fix: Enable Remove button functionality in Add Insurance section by @chakribontha in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8667 * Fixed the Patient age formatting in shifting board by @nihal467 in title: September Week 4 Release
text:
## What's Changed * Add feature flags by @vigneshhari in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2429 * added timeout to middleware requests by @DraKen0009 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2434 * update unique_bed_name_per_location to ignore deleted beds by @sainak in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2432 * fix string representation of prescription and mar by @sainak in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2412 * Convert enum choices to integer choices in Daily Rounds by @DraKen0009 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2462 * lint all files by @sainak in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2468 * Major dependencies update by @sainak in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2449 * fixing rhytmic_detail missing issue in event logs by @DraKen0009 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2467 * Update JSON schema validations of Daily Round fields by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2386 * Switch investigation default from `dict` to `list` and remove deprecated `prescriptions` by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2410 * use random uuid suffix in cover image key with size validation by @sainak in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2472 * convert image validator aspect ratio to list by @sainak in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2475 * Fix UnorderedObjectListWarning in patient search api by @sainak in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2478 * Avoid printing typst version in tests by @sainak in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2477 * Fix warnings from drf where min/max values of DecimalField were not instances of Decimal by @sainak in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2476 * Fixes default admin url by @shivankacker in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2474 * added a request time logging middleware by @DraKen0009 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2361 * Switch to ruff for lint and format by @sainak in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/1559 * Added Facility Hubs by @shivankacker in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2135 * fix:Hide asset users from users list page (#2107) by @ayushchauhan12 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2113 * Bump the all-dependencies group across 1 directory with 4 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2479 * Bump pydantic from 1.10.15 to 1.10.18 by @dependabot in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2484 * Prescriptions and MAR: Disallow users to perform edits on discharged encounters by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2133 * Reply feature for Doctor notes by @UdaySagar-Git in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2160 * Bump cryptography from 43.0.0 to 43.0.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2422 * disable default jwks for production deployments by @sainak in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2414 * update docker actions by @sainak in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2485 * Removed redundant room types in FacilityCapacity by @khavinshankar in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2417 * Soft delete assets from deleted facilities/hospitals by @hrit2773 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/1996 * Add user profile pictures by @UdaySagar-Git in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2253 * archived spo2 field to archived_spo2 by @DraKen0009 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2397 * merge migrations by @sainak in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2486 * Adds functionality for `last_consultation_admitted_bed_type_list` in discharge patient filters by @shivankacker in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2204 * HCX Plug by @khavinshankar in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2399 * fix aws deploys by @sainak in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2488 * fix facility capacity exports by @sainak in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2489 * disable aspect ratio validation for images by @sainak in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2487 * Set default permission class to IsAuthenticated & made required changes by @dhruv-goyal-10 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2268 * Allow installing plugs from env by @sainak in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2473 * CORS allow cloudflare pages preview deployments by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2490 * Bump the boto group with 2 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2493 * Fix all linting issues in care by @vigneshhari in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2483 * fix ulid class by @sainak in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2498 * fix events create by @sainak in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2501 * Add leeway for validating taken at in future by @sainak in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2502 ## New Contributors * @ayushchauhan12 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2113 * @UdaySagar-Git made their first contribution in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/pull/2160 **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care/compare/v24.39.0...v24.40.0

title: October Week 1 Release
text:
## What's Changed * Added Asset Info Popover to Camera Feed in Consultation Page by @Jacobjeevan in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8615 * Migrate `useDispatch` to `request` for exports by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8668 * Fix: Infinite Loading State When Notification is blocked or granted by @shauryag2002 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8659 * Remove "read more" for prescription notes in detailed view by @vishwansh01 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8647 * Remove facility cover image upload tooltip by @sainak in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8586 * Added Diagnosis at Discharge field when patient is discharged by @JOSHIK27 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8390 * Updated README to include info on translations by @shivankacker in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8690 * fix: add bed notification by @AdityaJ2305 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8632 * Enable features from backend feature flags by @shivankacker in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8512 * Bump @sentry/browser from 8.29.0 to 8.33.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8696 * Bump echarts from 5.5.0 to 5.5.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8524 * Fix: Qualification field for nurse user type by @AdityaJ2305 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8694 * Bump react-i18next from 13.5.0 to 15.0.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8537 * Reduce the Notification Message display timings by @HitishRaoP in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8689 * Fix: Facility page view in mobile phones by @Jash2606 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8693 * Send only known BP attributes by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8703 * store the camera position correctly in camera preset create by @sainak in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8710 ## New Contributors * @shauryag2002 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8659 * @Jash2606 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8693 **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/compare/v24.40.0...v24.41.0

title: October Week 3 Release
text:
## What's Changed * Fixed the update details button width in resource details page by @nihal467 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8757 * Fixed the type issue in the cypress test file by @nihal467 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8766 * New Cypress Test | Patient Details Advance Filters by @nihal467 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8750 * Revamped resource and shifting boards to the KanbanBoard component and removed react-dnd by @shivankacker in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8713 * Added units for pressure-sore by @noufalrahim in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8755 * Added ORAL as default for all route by @noufalrahim in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8754 * Downgraded Cypress to 13.14.2 and Removed @types/cypress by @nihal467 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8788 * New Cypress Test to verify functionality of Doctor Connect by @nihal467 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8791 * Removed unused packages by @shivankacker in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8778 * fix: prevent recursive redirect between session expired and root by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8777 * Death report is missing patient age by @HitishRaoP in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8702 * Fixes multiple tiny issues by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8784 * WIP: Care Plugin Support by @gigincg in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8660 * Updated README: updated CARE logo by @shivankacker in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8801 * Update styling for the side nav by @vinutv in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8789 * Fixing: Switch Blood Pressure and temperature dropdown to use TextFormField with type="number" instead of a dropdown #8644 by @AdityaJ2305 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8728 * Map preview on mobile fix by @Jacobjeevan in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8793 * Added Infinite Scrolling and Previous Item Persistence in Notifications by @shauryag2002 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8771 * Removed Background Colour of the Favicon by @nihal467 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8803 * Investigations Print Preview Page by @Jacobjeevan in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8679 * Added listing of Hub Facilities in Facility Home by @shivankacker in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8729 * Adds support for sorting locale file keys in pre-commit by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8806 * Updated UI for facility cards and avatar component by @shivankacker in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8782 * Sort only `en` locale file in the sort-locale script; Update docker and CI to use `npm run install-all` by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8813 * Corrected redirection of cancel button by @Rishith25 in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8823 * üì∑ Support for linking multiple cameras to a bed by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8253 * fix: close profile dropdown on first click when navigating by @JavidSumra in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8824 * Shifting csv generation fix by @Jacobjeevan in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8790 * Abdm V3 Plug Support by @khavinshankar in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8340 * Disable abha number linking when health facility id is not present by @khavinshankar in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8850 ## New Contributors * @Rishith25 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8823 * @JavidSumra made their first contribution in https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/8824 **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/compare/v24.42.0...v24.43.0
